short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirect links to the NY Times through the Ann Arbor District Library.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirect links to the NY Times through the Ann Arbor District Library. A valid library account with the AADL is required. This will give you an icon in the address bar when you are on either the NY Times site or the AADL redirected site that allows you to switch back and forth with a single click. You must be logged into AADL.
